title: Old Electric-Vehicle Batteries Are Getting a Second Life
sub_head: Auto makers like Nissan and Renault are using retired batteries to build large-scale energy-storage systems
body:
Millions of electric vehicles will be scrapped in the coming years. For the batteries that power them, that wonâ€™t be the end of the road.
Eventually, auto makers and recycling companies want to harvest valuable materials from old EV batteries to make new ones. But before they are recycled, used batteries could be given a second life on the electricity grid.
